SEARCH
Module com.example.teach
Package com.example.teach.controller

Class DashboardController

java.lang.Object
com.example.teach.controller.DashboardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class DashboardController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller for the main Dashboard view.

Manages the navigation drawer, user session, and dynamic loading of different center panes (Profile, Class Info, Subject pages, etc.). Implements Initializable to capture the original dashboard layout.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the controller after its root element has been completely processed. Saves the default center pane for later restoring when returning to the dashboard.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - URL of the FXML file
      resources - resource bundle for localization (unused)

    • setUser

      public void setUser(User user)
      Injects the authenticated user into the dashboard. Updates the user menu label and populates subject tiles based on role.

      Called by LoginPageController immediately after loading.

      Parameters:
      user - the logged-in User

    • setPageLabel

      public void setPageLabel(String text)
      Updates the page title label.
      Parameters:
      text - new title text

    • toggleDrawer

      public void toggleDrawer()
      Toggles visibility of the side drawer (hamburger menu).

    • goToDashboard

      public void goToDashboard(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent ev)
      Returns the user to the original dashboard center pane.
      Parameters:
      ev - mouse event from clicking the Dashboard button

      public void navigateTo(String fxmlPath, String pageTitle, Consumer<Object> initController)

      Parameters:

      pageTitle - title to set on the page label
